description: Number of increasing sequences of addition chain type with maximal element n.
comments: This sequence counts all addition chains for n. - _David W. Wilson_, Apr 01 2006In other words, a(n) = the number of increasing addition chains ending in n. - Don Reble (djr(AT)nk.ca), Apr 09 2006
links: Mauro Torelli, Increasing integer sequences and Goldbach's conjecture, RAIRO - Theoretical Informatics and Applications - Informatique Th√©orique et Applications, 40:2 (2006), pp. 107-121.
